reviews.review:
The gameplay itself is fun, and If you don't care about being competitive, it is. But the game has known, deep set issues that valve refuses to fix. The game should have had an overhaul of the anti cheat, which they tried to do and failed. It also was suppose to get and engine update to source 2, and that was dropped as well. I put in way to many house into the game, and wasted so much of my life with it. Crates gambling and a waste of money as well. \

I really wanted it to be a good game, and it has its ups and downs. The downs however, outweigh the ups.

et game med team foran alt andet vis ikke man kan få teamwork op og køre har du tapt lige meget hvor godt du er.
MM: har nogle udfordringer da det er mere og mere almen at bruge cheatse det gør ikke noget godt for nogen slet ikke dem som er på det andet hold. men stemningen og de folk som spiller er lærerige og giver gerne ud af deres viden det sys jeg er vildt epic og det gør jeg næsten ikke kan vendte til at komme på igen.

"Counter Strike Global Offensive is a game developed by Valve. It is extremely difficult considering you have to wrangle teammate, manage your economy, predict enemies' economy, buy the correct shit then aim for the head and spray correctly. Then there is bunch of extra shit like grenades, objectives, utility and whatever the fuck not. It's not a game for everyone. You have to be really good with your mouse
